_metadata.description: Header and workflow management UI requirements

requirements.title: Inline workflow title editing updates workflow name
requirements.description: Users can click the edit icon next to the workflow title to edit the name inline, with changes persisted on save

validation.notes: Validates inline title editing with save/cancel affordances

requirements.title: Execute button runs current workflow
requirements.description: Users can click the execute button in the header to run the current workflow and see execution feedback

validation.notes: Validates execute button triggers workflow execution with loading/success states

requirements.title: Info button displays workflow metadata popover
requirements.description: Users can click the info icon to view workflow metadata including creation date, last modified, folder path, and execution stats

validation.notes: Validates info popover displays correct metadata and dismisses properly

requirements.title: Save status indicator shows autosave state
requirements.description: The header displays real-time save status (saving, saved, error) to provide feedback on workflow persistence

validation.notes: Validates save status transitions through saving -> saved states
